Content: A Pegasus Airlines plane flying into Istanbulâ€™s Sabiha Gokcen airport skidded off the end of the wet runway and broke into three pieces after landing, injuring 139 people. Ali Yerlikaya said the plane was carrying 177 passengers and six crew from the western province of Izmir. He added that emergency response teams took the wounded to 18 hospitals in the area. Turkish broadcaster NTV reported that both pilots were critically injured. Emergency services were seen working at the scene, carrying rescued people toward ambulances and spraying water on the body of the crashed plane.
